com.lowagie.text.rtf.document

Class RtfDocumentHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.rtf.RtfElement
      • com.lowagie.text.rtf.document.RtfDocumentHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RtfBasicElement, RtfElementInterface

    public class RtfDocumentHeader
extends RtfElement
    The RtfDocumentHeader contains all classes required for the generation of the document header area.
    Version:
    $Id: RtfDocumentHeader.java 3580 2008-08-06 15:52:00Z howard_s $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (Mark.Hall@mail.room3b.eu), Thomas Bickel (tmb99@inode.at), Howard Shank (hgshank@yahoo.com)

      • convertHeaderFooter

        private RtfHeaderFooterGroup convertHeaderFooter(HeaderFooter hf,
                                       int type)
        Converts a HeaderFooter into a RtfHeaderFooterGroup. Depending on which class the HeaderFooter is, the correct RtfHeaderFooterGroup is created.
        Parameters:
        hf - The HeaderFooter to convert.
        type - Whether the conversion is being done on a footer or header
        Returns:
        The converted RtfHeaderFooterGroup.
        See Also:
        RtfHeaderFooter, RtfHeaderFooterGroup
